name: Dream Rock
description:
Keep your dream alive!  (Ludum Dare 46 jam entry)

Take care of your dream - it will fade to nothing if you neglect it for too long.

(Keeping mouse on the rock keeps it from fading. Moving mouse while on rock reduces neglect)

Polish your dream - shiny sparkly rock is a healthy rock!

(Left click and drag mouse around on the rock to polish)

Take care of yourself - your time is limited and your consciousness will fade out eventually, but engaging in healthy activities can keep the darkness away for a while.

(Click on randomly appearing activity circles - some activities increase your health)

Release your dream - make sure to do it before your time runs out.

(Right click on the rock to release)

Tools used: Godot, Krita
